entry.title: Touch - 6" Black Plastic Muddlers 92-942 - 500 / Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Touch
Type: Disposables
Price: 11.99

Touch - 6" Black Plastic Muddlers 92-942 - 500 / Pack

Plastic Muddlers are an absolute “must have” bartending tool for any bar or restaurant. Bartender’s love this extremely durable grinder tool and it’s a great addition to any bartending set. Whether you’re mashing up fresh fruit and spices for a delicious sangria, or crushing up mint leaves for a refreshing mojito or mint julep, your guests will be impressed with your high quality muddling tool and so will you! You are sure to find the perfect addition to your barware collection with the many options we offer. Choose from a variety of translucent muddlers, acrylic colorful muddlers and even ribbed and tenderizer head muddlers. Start releasing all the fresh flavors of fruits, spices, and herbs and begin infusing them into your favorite craft cocktails and have your guests coming back for more.

You can muddle and stir with the same fun disposable tool and offer your customers something eye-catching! Muddlers are an indispensable tool for making Mojito, Mint Juleps, Old Fashions and a long list of craft cocktails.

entry.title: Touch - 80-414N - 7" Round Tip Wooden Coffee Stir Sticks - 1000 / Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Touch
Type: Disposables
Price: 6.49

 An eco-friendly stick for coffee lovers! These Wooden Stir Sticks are made from all-natural wood and rounded at both ends.

When customers are mixing cream and sugar into their coffee, you don't want to waste spoon after spoon for just a few seconds of use. These wooden Stir Sticks are essential for any business that serves coffee. Place them in a plastic dispenser or in a cup for easy customer access in your business beverage area, or put them at tables at a restaurant or cafe!

 

Touch - 80-414N - 7" Round Tip Wooden Coffee Stir Sticks - 1000 / Pack

entry.summary:
Vendor: Stone
Type: Disposables

Brown hollow coffee stirrer, 7.5" long. Individually film wrapped for sanitation. More economic than standard flat coffee stirrers, these use less plastic but function the same. Ideal for people who want to sip and stir their coffee.5000 wrapped stirrers package in one corrugated case.

entry.title: Stone - 10" Super Jumbo Straw White Wrapped - 6 x 300 / Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Stone
Type: Disposables
Price: 60.99

Wrapped straws are key to hygiene & beverage safety. We offer a selection of wrapped straws, allowing you to provide the safest straw options to your customers. 

  • 8″ & 10″ straws.
  • Various colours.
  • Compostable paper or film wrap.
  • Great for restaurants, coffee shops, and bars, this straw is the perfect match for all of your cold beverages! With its simple design, you can use it in a variety of settings to provide your customers with a sanitary, convenient companion to their favorite drink!
